author: Reuters Editorial
title: UK starts coronavirus information service on WhatsApp
description: Britain has begun a coronavirus information campaign on WhatsApp to help combat the spread of misinformation.
content:
LONDON (Reuters) - Britain has begun a coronavirus information campaign on WhatsApp to help combat the spread of misinformation. 
“This service will help us ensure the public has a trusted source for the right information about coronavirus,” said Yvonne Doyl… [+162 chars]
